name: Hideseekers of SPLORR!!
description:
Attempting to follow the theme of "Hide and Seek", I decide to make a game in which you control a character that seeks hides.

You control a character moving about in a world populated by wabbits and ducks.

Yer goal is to collect as many hides of these critters as you can.

In order to collect a hide of a critter, you much skin one using a knife.

In order to skin one, it has to be dead, and you need a knife.

In order to kill one, you need a spear.

In order to craft tools like the spear and the knife, you will need to forage for materials and craft intermediate things.

Foraging and moving around generates hunger, and you will eventually starve to death. But you can eat meat, and keep going.

Good luck.
